branchCategory.name: AK15PA, Pneumatic Actuation Pressure Regulator, Low Flow (Tied-diaphragm)
branchCategory.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities. Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">® </span>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Actuation control pressure isolated from process gas by two seals <LI>Body material: 316 SS <LI>High inlet pressure type: Standard Max. 3500 psig (24.1 MPa) <LI>Flow capacity: Standard to 30 slpm <LI>Ni-Cr-Mo alloy internals available for corrosion resistance <LI>100 psig (0.69 MPa) outlet pressure achievable with 80 psig (0.55 MPa) control pressure or less</LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: AK15PA, Pneumatic Actuation Pressure Regulator, Low Flow (Tied-diaphragm)
